item.description: October's meetup was our best so far! What a great group of dogs that came out to play & we had great weather again! Our November meetup is scheduled for the 17th, from 1-2pm at Best Friends Pet Care in Boxford (right off of I-95). Don't worry if the weather isn't great - there's a large indoor play room to use for the meetup. Hopefully everyone can make it & we'll see you then!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: November Meetup!
